courses.description: Academic courses offered by the institution, representing the subjects that students can study as part of their degree programs. This table defines the curriculum structure across departments.

Course Code.description: A unique alphanumeric code assigned to an academic course to identify it within the institution.

Course Title.description: The official name of an academic course as listed in the curriculum.

Credits.description: The number of academic credits assigned to a course, indicating its relative weight or workload.

Department.description: The academic department or school that offers and manages the course.

faculty_info.description: Records representing faculty members of the institution, including their identity, departmental association, contact details, and the courses they teach.

Faculty ID.description: A unique identifier assigned to a faculty member by the institution.

Name.description: The name of a faculty member.

Department.description: The academic department to which a faculty member belongs.

Contact Info.description: Contact details used to communicate with a faculty member.

Courses Taught.description: The name or title of an academic course taught by a faculty member.

Course Code.description: The code of an academic course taught by a faculty member.

feedue.description: Records representing fees assigned to students, including the type of fee, the amount to be paid, and the date by which payment is due.

Student ID.description: An identifier used to distinguish the student to whom a fee record applies.

Fee Type.description: The category of fee charged to a student.

Amount Due.description: The amount of money that a student is required to pay for a specific fee.

Due Date.description: The date by which the fee amount is expected to be paid.

grades.description: Records representing students’ academic performance in individual courses for specific academic semesters, including evaluation scores and grade point averages.

Student ID.description: An identifier used to distinguish the student whose academic performance is recorded.

Course Code.description: The code of the academic course for which a student’s performance is recorded.

Semester.description: A numeric value representing the academic term in which the course was taken.

Marks.description: The numeric score obtained by a student in a course assessment.

GPA.description: The grade point average reflecting a student’s academic performance for the semester.

hostel.description: Records representing hostel accommodation details assigned to students, including room assignments, hostel names, and allotment dates.

Student ID.description: An identifier used to distinguish the student assigned to hostel accommodation.

Room Number.description: The room number assigned to a student within a hostel.

Hostel Name.description: The name of the hostel in which a student is accommodated.

Date of Allotment.description: The date on which hostel accommodation was allotted to a student.

parent_info.description: Records representing parents associated with students, including parent identifiers and names linked to individual students.

Parent ID.description: A unique identifier assigned to a parent.

Parent Name.description: The name of the parent associated with a student.

Student ID.description: An identifier used to distinguish the student associated with a parent.

registration.description: Records representing student enrollment in academic courses for specific semesters, including enrollment status for each course.

Student ID.description: An identifier used to distinguish the student associated with a course registration.

Course Code.description: The code of the academic course in which a student is registered.

Semester.description: A numeric value representing the academic term for which a course registration applies.

Status.description: The current state of a student’s registration for a course.

students_info.description: Records representing core student identity and profile information, including personal details, academic batch, and enrolled program or degree.

Student ID.description: A unique identifier assigned to a student.

Name.description: The full name of a student.

Date of Birth.description: The date on which a student was born.

Contact Info.description: Contact details provided for a student.

Batch.description: The academic year or batch to which a student belongs.

Program/Degree.description: The academic program or degree in which a student is enrolled.
